::Perceptor/Dragonfly/Blacknighmare/Darkfate::

Perceptor was underground and used his com link "Perceptor and mole 
squad... ready"
In his Position Dragonfly spoke to his comm link "Dragonfly and co. 
ready to hurt"
The femm reaven talked too "Blacknightmare and amazon squad... we're 
ready."

Darkfate answered in his comm link "I'll stay there in few cycles... 
don't shoot until my signal."
